pkgmetadata.longdescription: Boosting Beta Regression // Implements boosting beta regression for potentially high-dimensional data (Mayr et al., 2018 doi:10.1093/ije/dyy093). The 'betaboost' package uses the same parametrization as 'betareg' (Cribari-Neto and Zeileis, 2010 doi:10.18637/jss.v034.i02) to make results directly comparable. The underlying algorithms are implemented via the R add-on packages 'mboost' (Hofner et al., 2014 doi:10.1007/s00180-012-0382-5) and 'gamboostLSS' (Mayr et al., 2012 doi:10.1111/j.1467-9876.2011.01033.x).
